title: OrientalAsia SFX281
description: Traditional game sound effects pack with an Asian flair, featuring styles from Japan, India, China, and other Asian countries
longDescription:
Preview

  • https://youtu.be/RyBmlmyOjjs


Traditional game sound effects pack with an Asian flair, featuring styles from Japan, India, China, and other Asian countries

  • 281 Audio, 281 Cue
  • Japan, India, China Style

File.

  • China Impact 5
  • China Instrument 106
  • India Atmos 5
  • Impact 15
  • Japan Atmos 10
  • Japan Chanchick 5
  • Japan Gong 20
  • Japan Impact 9
  • Japan Instrument 35
  • KumiDaiko 50
  • Stick 5
  • Swing 15
  • Taiko 1

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 281
  • Number of Audio Cue: 281
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 30:49
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10 LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12 LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12 LU ~
  • Average Momentary : - 8 LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : -0 dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
